statements: SELECT * FROM carbon_footprint;
SELECT carbon_emission, packaging_material FROM carbon_footprint;
SELECT * FROM carbon_footprint ORDER BY production_process_id DESC;
SELECT packaging_material, carbon_emission FROM carbon_footprint WHERE carbon_emission > 10;
SELECT AVG(carbon_emission) AS average_emission FROM carbon_footprint;
SELECT production_process_id, packaging_material, carbon_emission FROM carbon_footprint WHERE carbon_emission > 100 ORDER BY carbon_emission DESC
SELECT packaging_material, carbon_emission FROM carbon_footprint WHERE packaging_material LIKE 'Plastic%' ORDER BY packaging_material ASC
SELECT * FROM carbon_footprint WHERE carbon_emission BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY production_process_id ASC
SELECT production_process_id, packaging_material FROM carbon_footprint WHERE packaging_material IS NOT NULL ORDER BY production_process_id DESC
SELECT AVG(carbon_emission) as avg_emission FROM carbon_footprint
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT material_name, carbon_footprint FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT material_id, material_name, carbon_footprint FROM packaging_materials WHERE carbon_footprint > 0;
SELECT material_name, carbon_footprint FROM packaging_materials ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT process_name, process_description FROM packaging_processes;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials WHERE material_name = 'Cardboard';
SELECT material_name, carbon_footprint FROM packaging_materials ORDER BY carbon_footprint DESC;
SELECT process_name, process_description FROM packaging_processes WHERE material_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT material_name, carbon_footprint FROM packaging_materials WHERE carbon_footprint > 0.5 ORDER BY carbon_footprint ASC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials JOIN packaging_processes ON packaging_materials.material_id = packaging_processes.material_id;
SELECT * FROM PackagingMaterials;
SELECT material_name, carbon_footprint FROM PackagingMaterials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_id, material_name, carbon_footprint FROM PackagingMaterials WHERE carbon_footprint > 0.5;
SELECT process_id, process_name FROM ProductionProcesses WHERE carbon_emission_rate < 0.1 ORDER BY process_name;
SELECT packaging_name, process_name FROM PackagingProcesses JOIN ProductionProcesses ON PackagingProcesses.process_id = ProductionProcesses.process_id;
SELECT * FROM PackagingMaterials;
SELECT material_name, carbon_footprint FROM PackagingMaterials WHERE carbon_footprint > 0;

SELECT material_name, process_name FROM PackagingMaterials JOIN PackagingProcesses ON PackagingMaterials.material_id = PackagingProcesses.material_id JOIN ProductionProcesses ON PackagingProcesses.process_id = ProductionProcesses.process_id;
SELECT * FROM ProductionProcesses WHERE carbon_emission_rate > 0 ORDER BY process_name DESC;

SELECT packaging_name, material_name, process_description FROM PackagingProcesses JOIN PackagingMaterials ON PackagingProcesses.material_id = PackagingMaterials.material_id JOIN ProductionProcesses ON PackagingProcesses.process_id = ProductionProcesses.process_id;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT material_name, carbon_footprint FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT material_name, process_id FROM packaging_materials, packaging_products WHERE packaging_materials.material_id = packaging_products.material_id;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE emissions_factor > 0.5;

SELECT packaging_products.product_name, production_facilities.location FROM packaging_products JOIN production_facilities ON packaging_products.facility_id = production_facilities.facility_id AND packaging_products.production_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, material_name FROM packaging_products WHERE material_id = 2;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM production_facilities WHERE location = 'California' ORDER BY facility_name;
SELECT product_name, process_name, emissions_factor FROM packaging_products JOIN manufacturing_processes ON packaging_products.process_id = manufacturing_processes.process_id;
SELECT AVG(carbon_footprint) AS avg_carbon_footprint FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT * FROM Packaging_Companies;
SELECT company_id, company_name, location FROM Packaging_Companies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Packaging_Materials WHERE material_source = 'Recycled';
SELECT production_id, SUM(production_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Packaging_Production GROUP BY production_id;

SELECT u.username, s.emission_amount, p.production_date FROM Packaging_Users u JOIN Packaging_Production p ON u.user_id = p.company_id JOIN Packaging_Statistics s ON p.production_id = s.production_id;
SELECT * FROM Packaging_Companies;
SELECT company_name, location FROM Packaging_Companies WHERE location='New York';

SELECT company_name, material_type, production_date FROM Packaging_Companies JOIN Packaging_Production ON Packaging_Companies.company_id = Packaging_Production.company_id JOIN Packaging_Materials ON Packaging_Production.material_id = Packaging_Materials.material_id;
SELECT DISTINCT material_type FROM Packaging_Materials WHERE emissions_factor > 0.5 ORDER BY material_type DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT company_id) AS total_companies, SUM(production_quantity) AS total_production FROM Packaging_Production;
